choose.when: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%' AND space_num = #{space_num}
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate FROM qna WHERE users_num=#{users_num} ORDER BY num

SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate FROM seller_space INNER JOIN qna ON qna.space_num = seller_space.space_num WHERE seller_space.users_num=(SELECT MAX(users_num) FROM space_users WHERE id=#{id}) ORDER BY num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate, users_num, space_num) VALUES (qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE, #{users_num}, #{space_num})
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) qnaPrevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) qnaNextNum FROM qna) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
